name: Base Email Template
description: Copy this file and modify for your specific email type. This is the foundation for all email templates.

variables.name: firstName
variables.aiInstructions: Use the recipient's first name from the database

variables.name: heroTitle
variables.description: Main headline at top of email
variables.aiInstructions: Create an engaging, action-oriented headline that summarizes the email's purpose

variables.name: heroSubtitle
variables.description: Supporting text under the main headline
variables.defaultValue: We're excited to have you here
variables.aiInstructions: Provide context or additional detail about the email's purpose

variables.name: mainMessage
variables.defaultValue: Thank you for your interest. Here's what you need to know...
variables.aiInstructions: Craft the core message based on the email's purpose. Be clear and concise.

variables.name: additionalInfo
variables.defaultValue: If you have any questions, please don't hesitate to reach out.
variables.aiInstructions: Provide helpful context, next steps, or supportive information

variables.name: ctaText
variables.aiInstructions: Create action-oriented button text (e.g., 'View Invoice', 'Confirm Attendance', 'Download Now')

variables.name: ctaUrl
variables.aiInstructions: Generate the appropriate URL for the action

previewData.heroSubtitle: You're all set to get started
previewData.mainMessage: We're excited to have you on board. Your account has been successfully created and you can now access all features.
previewData.additionalInfo: Check out our getting started guide to make the most of your experience.
